string-array.name: birthdaywishes
string-array.item: "May all your wishes come true and may all that you desire comes to you on this special occasion. Wishing you a birthday celebration so joyful and memorable!"
"Wishing you a day filled with happiness and a year filled with joy. Happy birthday!"
"Hope your birthday is as special as you are, dear. May all your wishes and dream come true. Enjoy your birthday and count your blessings."
"You are the most precious among all the gems in this world. Today we celebrate the day when a star was born not in the sky but on the earth!"
"Very few people have the luck of having such a supportive and encouraging friend like you! You are awesome and always will be. Many good wishes for your birthday!"
"As you say goodbye to another year, just know that weâ€™ll make a ton of sweet memories once again in the coming year! Happy Birthday!"
"Have a wonderful birthday. I wish your every day to be filled with lots of love, laughter, happiness and the warmth of sunshine."
"Wishing you a very special birthday and a wonderful year ahead!"
